overview:
NSString  sr_sensorForDeletionRecordsFromSensor() Instance Methodsr_sensorForDeletionRecordsFromSensor()iOS 14.0+iPadOS 14.0+Mac Catalyst 14.0+func sr_sensorForDeletionRecordsFromSensor() -> SRSensor?Return ValueMay return nil if there is no deletion record available for this sensor

Returns a sensor stream that contains deletion records of the sensor

This sensor stream should only be used for fetching. All other operations will be ignored. Deletion records share the recording and authorization state with their parent sensor.

Instance Method# sr_sensorForDeletionRecordsFromSensor()

iOS 14.0+iPadOS 14.0+Mac Catalyst 14.0+

```
func sr_sensorForDeletionRecordsFromSensor() -> SRSensor?
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/Foundation/NSString/sr_sensorForDeletionRecordsFromSensor()#return-value)

May return nil if there is no deletion record available for this sensor

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSString/sr_sensorForDeletionRecordsFromSensor()#discussion)

Returns a sensor stream that contains deletion records of the sensor

This sensor stream should only be used for fetching. All other operations will be ignored. Deletion records share the recording and authorization state with their parent sensor.
